title: Remote Mathematics Education Design Using the HEART Strategy: Simulation/VR-Based Expert Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary mathematics concepts and professional (medical/legal/technical) practical experience
context.additional_context: Customized mathematical modeling training using simulation/VR tools in BYOD environments, focusing on mathematical approaches for professional problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can generate at least three mathematics learning designs tailored to their professional context by applying the HEART strategy

Learners achieve over 80% problem-solving rate for professional practice issues (e.g., medical diagnostic accuracy analysis, legal evidence probability calculation) using probability/statistics modeling in VR simulation environments
Learners validate the pedagogical validity of designed learning activities at 4.0/5.0 or higher through peer evaluation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
